name: Kathrine Chandler
about: My Husband absolutely loves this cologne and I do too! It is very light and very fresh smelling. I will order it again!!!

name: Afsana
about: My boyfriend loves this perfume so I purchsased 2 bottles of these as birthday gifts. He was so happy and so am I. I got good price as well as comprare to perfume store.

name: Dennis Branch
about: My nephew was so impressed received as a stocking stuffer for Christmas he smiled all evening after immediately putting some on ! Great choice!

name: Doha
about: Love this cologne! Great scent and just right , not overpowering, however it doesn't have a long ' last' to it - still well worth the purchase!

name: Islam
about: Something I would definitely buy again.

name: Soto Alvarado
about: Everything is great about it, price and quality.
